name: Hotel Riu Palace Maspalomas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: From entering the Riu Palace Maspalomas the hotel staff are as efficient as any hotel of similar star rating or even Hotels of de-lux standard.The rooms are clean tidy and fairly well equiped(No coffee or tea making facilities)
reviews.title: all most perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Restaurant was excellent, and again the Maitre a de was a master in his own class,his staff were very attentive.
reviews.title: Grand restaurant and quality food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Outside areas again were imacculate, swiming pool, towels etc and attention to detail was superb.
reviews.title: Christmas in Spain....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we will be back if the Thomson representative is more accommodating
reviews.title: A relaxing and warm experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well done.
reviews.title: Another lovely holiday at this hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am originally from Gran Canaria so I know this hotel just from the beginning. To start with, I must say that the location and views are unbeatable. It is situated just over the Maspalomas dunes.
reviews.title: From excellent to normal in 2 days

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can understand that, being a quite old hotel, you find things that need to be updated but, once you stay there for a while, some of those are not understandable in 2012. First, and most, the non existent wifi in the rooms (not even to pay for). Come on! In these days we need the internet for everything, from see the weather prediction to restaurant reviews or keeping in touch with your friends in family. In the Riu Palace Maspalomas, you have to go down to the reception and sit there to do your search.
reviews.title: I would give this 6 stars

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Second, the breakfast. I have never been in a breakfast buffet so badly organized. The quality of the food is OK (only OK), but you have to wander from place to place to find things. I seems anything is not where you expected it to be. Third, understandable because of the public they have but uncomfortable anyway, everything is sooooo german (from the first ten channels on the TV to the information, etc. By the way, having tasted the german bread, I don't understand why they have not started a riot about the quality of it in the hotel.
reviews.title: Superb Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One thing I have to give an excellent to is the quality and kindness of personnel. They are all nice, willing to help and solve you any problem you have. 5 stars for them.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was my first stay in this hotel and I won't be probably staying there again if they don't change some things, Today they are better options in the Meloneras area. It is a pity because, as I said, seeing the dunes and the see from your room is incredible.
reviews.title: Another great stay at the Riu

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: Spent 1 week in the south point of Playa del Ingles.
reviews.title: It was a real great time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the check in to the time i left, staff was great. Everything was very organized, clean, friendly.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Lovely Service, Great Location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Even it was peak season and the hotel was crowed, staff was very helpful, front desk now your name. Even at breakfast it well organized, self serving buffet with many fresh juices what I most appreciated.
reviews.title: Superb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For Wifi you had to go to the Lobby. WLAN was not very fast. In the rooms no WIFI.
reviews.title: give it a go

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012
reviews.text: I expect that now.
reviews.title: Lazy break july

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: have stayed at this hotel 3 times before but not for a few years ,it is still the best hotel/apartment in playa del ingles ,forget some of the propertys rated above it on trip advisor ,trust me i have stayed in or been in most of the hotels on the list and this is most certainly number one ,no question. we payed extra for a sea view room ,worth every penny the view was so good looking over the sand dunes and sea i could have sat and looked at that for two weeks !! food is excellent there really is something for everybody ,if you cant find something you like in this restaurant then i would be very very surprised . service all round from everyone ,porters ,waiters ,bar staff ,cleaners ,management, front desk .pool attendants .gardeners is truly exceptional ,this level of service makes for a hugely relaxing and enjoyable stay . would advise anyone to stay here ,it is that good ,negatives ..... nope sorry cant think of one .give yourself a treat and stay here if your going to playa del ingles.oh and do try the champagne sangria at the bar .one jug and your ready to rumble lol
reviews.title: classy hotel wonderful location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have to say that this was the nicest holiday I have ever been on - the rooms were clean, bright and very comfortable. Do pay for a sea view, it is so worth it. The staff could not do more to help and that included helping us learn Spanish.
reviews.title: Best Holiday Ever!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was brilliant - lots of choice and all fresh. Breakfasts had an amazing selection fresh fruit juices - and so much choice of food. Dinner was equally special and the staff in the resturant were so nice.
reviews.title: A bit over-rated in my view.... Good but some shortcomings....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The gardens and the pools were brilliant - I can not rate this holtel highly enough. I would book again and again and again.......
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Normally after 10 days of a holiday I am ready to go home. This was the first time that I did not want to leave even when the bus was there to take us to the airport - it was the most stress free, relaxing holiday ever.
reviews.title: Simply the best.................

aka: Riu Palace Maspalomas Hotel Playa Del Ingles
description: Located in Playa del Ingles. Next to the Maspalomas sand dunes. 4-storey building. Colonial-style architecture. 28,000 m2 of subtropical gardens. 800 m from the beach. 2 km from the city centre. 500 m from various shops. 30 km from the airport. 50 m from a bus stop. Credit cards accepted: Visa, MasterCard, Amex, Diners.
